description: This file sets up an AI agent with specific tools and storage, and makes sample queries to it.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that integrates a model, storage, and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: OllamaTools
classes.description: A class representing the Ollama language model tools.

classes.name: PostgresStorage
classes.description: A class for storing data in a PostgreSQL database.

classes.name: DuckDuckGoTools
classes.description: A class providing search capabilities via DuckDuckGo.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to send a prompt to the agent and print its response.
